data.name: Dark Sandslash
rules: This Pokémon is both Fighting Darkness type.

abilities.name: Poison Payback
abilities.text: If Dark Sandslash is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Dark Sandslash is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Swift
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokémon.

data.name: Alolan Sandslash

abilities.name: Slush Rush
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw a card.

attacks.name: Smash Turn
attacks.text: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

data.flavorText: Fleeing a volcanic eruption, it settled on a snowy mountain. As it races through the snowfields, it sends up a spray of snow.

attacks.name: Needles
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Sandstorm
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

data.name: Sandslash

attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

data.flavorText: If it digs at an incredible pace, it may snap off its spike and claws. They grow back in a day.

data.name: Sandslash δ
rules: This Pokémon is both Fighting Metal type.

abilities.name: Delta Storm
abilities.text: As long as Sandslash is your Active Pokémon, put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokémon-ex between turns.

attacks.name: Rend
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

data.name: Alolan Sandslash

abilities.name: Slush Rush
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw a card.

attacks.name: Smash Turn
attacks.text: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

data.flavorText: Fleeing a volcanic eruption, it settled on a snowy mountain. As it races through the snowfields, it sends up a spray of snow.

data.name: Alolan Sandslash

attacks.name: Spike Armor
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokémon is damaged by an attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 6 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

data.flavorText: This Pokémon's steel spikes are sheathed in ice. Stabs from these spikes cause deep wounds and severe frostbite as well.

attacks.name: Sand Swirl
attacks.text: Does 20 damage to each Defending Pokémon. The Defending Pokémon can't retreat until the end of your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Earthquake
attacks.text: Does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness or Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Swift
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Pokémon Powers, or any other effects on the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Needle Ball
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

data.name: Sandslash

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

data.flavorText: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.

data.name: Sandslash

abilities.name: Dig Down
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top 5 cards in your deck. Choose as many Fighting Energy cards as you like, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Put the other cards back on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Sandslash is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Needle
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned.

data.flavorText: It curls up, then rolls into foes with its back. Its sharp spines inflict severe damage.

data.name: Sandslash

attacks.name: Spike Armor
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, if Sandslash is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Sandslash is Knocked Out), put 4 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Poison Spike
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, that Pokémon is now Poisoned.

data.flavorText: It curls up, then rolls into foes with its back. Its sharp spines inflict severe damage.

data.name: Sandslash

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

data.flavorText: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.

data.name: Sandslash

attacks.name: Sand-Attack
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Earthquake
attacks.text: Does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.flavorText: The spikes on its body are made up of its hardened hide. It rolls up and attacks foes with its spikes.

data.name: Sandslash

attacks.name: Swift
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, or any other effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

data.flavorText: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.

data.name: Sandslash

attacks.name: Continuous Scratch
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 30 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Sand Tomb
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

data.flavorText: Its claws and horns often break off. The broken claws and horns can be used to carve plows for tilling farm fields.

data.name: Alolan Sandslash

attacks.name: Tumbling Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage.

data.flavorText: This Pokémon's steel spikes are sheathed in ice. Stabs from these spikes cause deep wounds and severe frostbite as well.

attacks.name: Sand Trap
attacks.text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, choose up to 2 of them. This attack does 10 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Poison Needle Rush
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads. If you get at least 1 heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

data.name: Alolan Sandslash

attacks.name: Curve Strike
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Reinforced Needle
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool card attached to it, this attack does 60 more damage.

data.flavorText: It runs across snow-covered plains at high speeds. It developed thick, sharp claws to plow through the snow.

data.name: Alolan Sandslash-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Spiky Shield
abilities.text: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 3 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Spiky Storm-GX
attacks.text: This attack does 100 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

data.name: Sandslash

attacks.name: Dig Uppercut
attacks.text: Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

data.flavorText: Thanks to its thick claws, it's good at climbing trees. There are plenty of Sandslash that park themselves in trees and go right to sleep.

data.name: Sandslash

attacks.name: Rumble
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

attacks.name: Spike Rend
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 100 more damage.

data.flavorText: It climbs trees by hooking on with its sharp claws. Sandslash shares the berries it gathers, dropping them down to Sandshrew waiting below the tree.

data.name: Sandslash

attacks.name: Earthquake
attacks.text: This attack also does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.flavorText: The spikes on its body are made up of its hardened hide. It rolls up and attacks foes with its spikes.

attacks.name: Sand Attack
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, if the Defending Pokémon tries to use an attack, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack doesn't happen.
